name: nightswitch
description: Switches between day and night theme at time specified by the user, or based on the user location.

nightswitch.dayTheme.description: Specifies which theme is to be shown during the day.

nightswitch.nightTheme.description: Specifies which theme is to be shown during the night.

nightswitch.location.description: (Priority 2) Specifies the user location in decimal degrees. Example input: "(49.89,-97.14)".

nightswitch.geolocation.description: (Priority 3) Specifies whether to geolocate user. Please note that by setting this to true you give permission to infer your location with your IP address.

nightswitch.sunrise.description: (Priority 1) Manually set the time of sunrise. Accepts 24-Hour format "HH:MM"

nightswitch.sunset.description: (Priority 1) Manually set the time of sunset. Accepts 24-Hour format "HH:MM", (eg. "18:30")

nightswitch.autoSwitch.description: Automatically switch the theme to day or night (if VSCode has different theme in middle of day, automatically switches to dayTheme)
